column5: Does anyone know of a good bait shop between the Soo and Espanola that carry leeches by the pound? Was up that way last year and the only place I found in Espanola was selling them for $5 a dozen!!!!

Not possitive if they sell them by the pound. But this is where I get my flat of crawlers every year. You might give them a call.Chippewa Trading Post1332 Great Northern RoadSault Ste. Marie, Ontario(705) 759-4518
Probably leaving around July 1st or so.

there is a place in Iron Bridge, between blind river and espanola, once your in Iron Bridge, if your coming from the Soo heading east, turn left at the arena in Iron Bridge, the bait shop is on the left hand side of the road. hope this helps. I forget the name of it, i just remember how to get there.
